originalText.text: Since September 2022 life of my wife has been divided into BEFORE and AFTER. BEFORE is feeling of full-flegded human happiness,family understanding and respect. AFTER this is an examination in Memorial Sloan Kettering and diagnos is inoperable liver cancer, 8 sessions of chemotherapy and complete hopelessness and despair. But miracles happened in life and this miracle was after all tests consent great surgeon Karim J. Halazun to resection of a large part of the liver. On April 12 this year,after successful hour-long surgery performed  by Dr. Halazun and great team,a miracle happened. Attentive absolutely confident in his knowledge, surgeon of the highest world class, Dr. Halazun gave to her a second life and returned to  former happy state. Dr.KARIM J.HALAZUN is a HERO IN our family.

originalText.text: Dr. Halazun is an extremely talented surgeon.  He is an excellent doctor who truly cares about his patients.  I was very nervous to have surgery, but he made me feel safe and informed.  He was patient and took the time to answer all my questions and I highly recommend him.

text.text: Dr. Halazun is an extremely talented surgeon.  He is an excellent doctor who truly cares about his patients.  I was very nervous to have surgery, but he made me feel safe and informed.  He was patient and took the time to answer all my questions and I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Found him to be completely unprofessional, uncaring, untinking, and heartless when he showed up uninvited to my hospital room. I have not found another Dr with less empathy on my illness journey. That is saying a lot because I have met some horrors. None compares to my experience with him. Stay away. There are plenty of caring doctors out there. He is not one of them in my experience.

text.text: Found him to be completely unprofessional, uncaring, untinking, and heartless when he showed up uninvited to my hospital room. I have not found another Dr with less empathy on my illness journey. That is saying a lot because I have met some horrors. None compares to my experience with him. Stay away. There are plenty of caring doctors out there. He is not one of them in my experience.

originalText.text: My family had a video conference regarding my fathers health.  Dr. Halazun was kind and engaging answering all our questions.  He is patient and honest and never painted a rosy picture to get us into his office which we found refreshing.  He never hurried us but took his time and addressed all of our concerns and questions.  It was six of us on the call so he understood the importance of family participation and encourages this.  We came off the call feeling positive and encouraged.

originalText.text: Beautiful, safe and friendly environment. Staff exceptional. Dr Halazun was kind, gentle, exceptionally knowledgeable, and thorough. I’ve known him since 2019 and he’s been consistently exceptional in his field of medicine.
